entry.title: Current Conditions: 4.0°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: North East Margaree 02:00 AM AST Tuesday 21 February 2023
Temperature: 4.0°C
Pressure / Tendency: 99.7 kPa rising
Humidity: 96 %
Dewpoint: 3.5°C
Wind: SSW 3 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Monday night: Rain or snow. Low minus 2.
entry.summary: Rain ending late this evening then cloudy with flurries beginning before morning. Rainfall amount 10 mm. Wind south 40 km/h gusting to 70 except gusting to 100 from Margaree Harbour to Bay St. Lawrence early this evening. Wind becoming southwest 20 gusting to 40 this evening. Low minus 2. Wind chill minus 8 overnight. Forecast issued 4:00 PM AST Monday 20 February 2023

entry.title: Tuesday: Flurries. Temperature falling to minus 4 in the afternoon.
entry.summary: Flurries ending in the afternoon then clearing. Wind southwest 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming northwest 30 gusting to 50 in the morning then light late in the afternoon. Temperature falling to minus 4 in the afternoon. Wind chill near minus 12. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 4:00 PM AST Monday 20 February 2023

entry.title: Tuesday night: A few clouds. Low minus 10.
entry.summary: Clear. Becoming partly cloudy in the evening. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 10. Wind chill near minus 15. Forecast issued 4:00 PM AST Monday 20 February 2023
